text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 131 CLEAN AND GREEN FUTURE removal of large volumes of surface water from the system, which currently limit the capacity of the sewer system in certain parts of the borough, particularly the Isle of Dogs Opportunity Area. This will help to manage the significant increase of foul water discharge which planned developments in the borough will generate, without increasing the risk of sewer flooding in Critical Drainage Areas and reducing the need for combined sewer system upgrades.
